thread.title: World faces a $1.23 trillion foreign investment vacuum
thread.title_full: World faces a $1.23 trillion foreign investment vacuum

author: Andrew Critchlow
title: World faces a $1.23 trillion foreign investment vacuum
text: Economics World faces a $1.23 trillion foreign investment vacuum The collapse in oil prices and China's economic malaise could bring a retreat of foreign direct investment and capital to the West, writes Andrew Critchlow Arab oil wealth on the streets of London Photo: Tony Kershaw/SWNS.com By Andrew Critchlow , Commodities editor 5:22PM BST 28 Aug 2015
